dt-example.title: Configuration option
dt-example.info:
This is the SearchPane extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows how the definition of the `threshold` config option allows the user to define the level of uniqueness for a pane to be displayed. The `threshold` of uniqueness is the number of unique values throughout the table divided by the total number of values.
Thresholds can also be set for individual columns. Here we set the threshold of the firstname column to be 0.99.
The default of `threshold` is 0.6
